column2: the food is good. I opted for the Goat Patty Melt. The bread was very crunchy
column3: just the way I like it. The goat was a bit overcooked but the sauteed onions and cheese sauce made up for that. Of course
column4: this is yet another restaurant where sides aren't included
column5: an unnecessary ploy to make people spend more just to leave satiated.
